sentences.en: He answered her greeting with a benedicite.
He didn't even return my greeting.
He raised a hand in greeting.
He took her hand in greeting and asked solicitously how everything was.
sentences.cn: 他握着她的手表示问候，关切地问她一切是否都好。

sentences.en: He turned his sightless eyes their way and boomed out a greeting.
sentences.cn: 他将失明的双眼转向他们，低声打了个招呼。

sentences.en: Her greeting was cold and strained.
Her greeting was less than enthusiastic.
sentences.cn: 她的问候一点都不热情。

sentences.en: I nodded at him in greeting.
I smiled a polite greeting, but the woman hardly acknowledged me.
sentences.cn: 我客气地笑着打了个招呼，可是那女人没有答理我。

sentences.en: Livy thought Caroline's greeting seemed a little restrained.
sentences.cn: 莉薇觉得卡罗琳的问候似乎有些不冷不热。

sentences.en: Please give my greeting to Miss Macleod.
sentences.cn: 请代我向麦克劳德小姐问候.

sentences.en: Please give my greeting to Ms. Macleod.
sentences.cn: 请代我向麦克劳德女士问候.

sentences.en: She exchanged a few words of greeting with the guests.
The two cousins exchanged greetings (= greeted each other ) .
There was a tinge of condescension in her greeting.
sentences.cn: 她的问候中带着一丝傲慢。

words.tran_cn: 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘

trans.tran_en: something you say or do when you meet someone
